sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM , Q.FCLTS_JOB_SE , GAM_GET_FCLTS_JOB_SE_NM(Q.FCLTS_JOB_SE) AS FCLTS_JOB_SE_NM , TO_CHAR(Q.QC_MNG_SEQ) QC_MNG_SEQ , Q.QC_MNG_NM , Q.ENFORCE_YEAR , TO_CHAR(Q.QC_INSP_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') QC_INSP_DT , Q.QC_SE , GAM_GET_QC_SE_NM(Q.QC_SE) QC_SE_NM , Q.QC_INSP_TP , GAM_GET_QC_INSP_TP_NM(Q.QC_INSP_TP) QC_INSP_TP_NM , Q.QC_INSP_SE , GAM_GET_QC_INSP_SE_NM(Q.QC_INSP_SE) QC_INSP_SE_NM , Q.QC_INSP_INSTT_NM , Q.RESPON_ENGINEER_NM , TO_CHAR(Q.QC_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') QC_BEGIN_DT , TO_CHAR(Q.QC_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') QC_END_DT , Q.QC_INSP_AMT , Q.STTUS_EVL_LVL , GAM_GET_STTUS_EVL_LVL_NM(Q.STTUS_EVL_LVL) STTUS_EVL_LVL_NM , Q.QC_INSP_RESULT , Q.ACTION_CN , Q.RM FROM QC_MNG_DTLS_F Q INNER JOIN FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F F ON Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO WHERE 1 = 1
AND Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND Q.FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe#
AND Q.QC_MNG_NM LIKE '%' || #sQcMngNm# || '%'
AND Q.QC_SE = #sQcSe#
AND Q.ENFORCE_YEAR = #sEnforceYear#
ORDER BY Q.ENFORCE_YEAR DESC , F.PRT_AT_CODE , Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , Q.FCLTS_JOB_SE , Q.QC_MNG_SEQ ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM QC_MNG_DTLS_F Q WHERE 1 = 1
AND Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND Q.FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe#
AND Q.QC_MNG_NM LIKE '%' || #sQcMngNm# || '%'
AND Q.QC_SE = #sQcSe#
AND Q.ENFORCE_YEAR = #sEnforceYear#

SELECT Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , (SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM , Q.FCLTS_JOB_SE , TO_CHAR(Q.QC_MNG_SEQ) QC_MNG_SEQ , Q.QC_MNG_NM , Q.ENFORCE_YEAR , TO_CHAR(Q.QC_INSP_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') QC_INSP_DT , Q.QC_SE , Q.QC_INSP_TP , Q.QC_INSP_SE , Q.QC_INSP_INSTT_NM , Q.RESPON_ENGINEER_NM , TO_CHAR(Q.QC_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') QC_BEGIN_DT , TO_CHAR(Q.QC_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') QC_END_DT , Q.QC_INSP_AMT , Q.STTUS_EVL_LVL , Q.QC_INSP_RESULT , Q.ACTION_CN , Q.RM FROM QC_MNG_DTLS_F Q WHERE Q.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo# AND Q.FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe# AND Q.QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#sQcMngSeq#)
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(QC_MNG_SEQ),0) + 1) FROM QC_MNG_DTLS_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe#
INSERT INTO QC_MNG_DTLS_F ( FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , FCLTS_JOB_SE , QC_MNG_SEQ , ENFORCE_YEAR , QC_MNG_NM , QC_INSP_DT , QC_SE , QC_INSP_TP , QC_INSP_SE , QC_INSP_INSTT_NM , RESPON_ENGINEER_NM , QC_BEGIN_DT , QC_END_DT , QC_INSP_AMT , STTUS_EVL_LVL , QC_INSP_RESULT , ACTION_CN , RM , REG_USR , REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #fcltsMngGroupNo# , #fcltsJobSe# , TO_NUMBER(#maxQcMngSeq#) , #enforceYear# , #qcMngNm# , TO_DATE(#qcInspDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #qcSe# , #qcInspTp# , #qcInspSe# , #qcInspInsttNm# , #responEngineerNm# , TO_DATE(#qcBeginDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , TO_DATE(#qcEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#qcInspAmt#, ',', '')) , #sttusEvlLvl# , #qcInspResult# , #actionCn# , #rm# , #regUsr# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE QC_MNG_DTLS_F SET ENFORCE_YEAR = #enforceYear# , QC_MNG_NM = #qcMngNm# , QC_INSP_DT = TO_DATE(#qcInspDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , QC_SE = #qcSe# , QC_INSP_TP = #qcInspTp# , QC_INSP_SE = #qcInspSe# , QC_INSP_INSTT_NM = #qcInspInsttNm# , RESPON_ENGINEER_NM = #responEngineerNm# , QC_BEGIN_DT = TO_DATE(#qcBeginDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , QC_END_DT = TO_DATE(#qcEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , QC_INSP_AMT = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#qcInspAmt#, ',', '')) , STTUS_EVL_LVL = #sttusEvlLvl# , QC_INSP_RESULT = #qcInspResult# , ACTION_CN = #actionCn# , RM = #rm# , UPD_USR = #updUsr# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#qcMngSeq#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM QC_MNG_DTLS_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#qcMngSeq#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT O.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , O.FCLTS_JOB_SE , O.QC_MNG_SEQ , O.FCLTS_MNG_NO , (SELECT G.PRT_FCLTY_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F G WHERE G.FCLTS_MNG_NO = O.FCLTS_MNG_NO) PRT_FCLTY_NM , O.STTUS_EVL_LVL , GAM_GET_STTUS_EVL_LVL_NM(O.STTUS_EVL_LVL) STTUS_EVL_LVL_NM , TO_CHAR(O.QC_INSP_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') QC_INSP_DT , O.INSPECTOR , O.QC_INSP_RESULT , O.RM FROM QC_MNG_OBJ_FCLTS_F O WHERE O.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo# AND O.FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe# AND O.QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#sQcMngSeq#) ORDER BY O.FCLTS_MNG_NO ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM QC_MNG_OBJ_FCLTS_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo# AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe# AND QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#sQcMngSeq#)
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO QC_MNG_OBJ_FCLTS_F ( FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , FCLTS_JOB_SE , QC_MNG_SEQ , FCLTS_MNG_NO , STTUS_EVL_LVL , QC_INSP_DT , INSPECTOR , QC_INSP_RESULT , RM , REG_USR , REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #fcltsMngGroupNo# , #fcltsJobSe# , TO_NUMBER(#qcMngSeq#) , #fcltsMngNo# , #sttusEvlLvl# , TO_DATE(#qcInspDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #inspector# , #qcInspResult# , #rm# , #regUsr# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE QC_MNG_OBJ_FCLTS_F SET STTUS_EVL_LVL = #sttusEvlLvl# , QC_INSP_DT = TO_DATE(#qcInspDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , QC_INSP_RESULT = #qcInspResult# , INSPECTOR = #inspector# , RM = #rm# , UPD_USR = #updUsr# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#qcMngSeq#) AND FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM QC_MNG_OBJ_FCLTS_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#qcMngSeq#) AND FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#
DELETE FROM QC_MNG_OBJ_FCLTS_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#qcMngSeq#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , F.FCLTS_JOB_SE , F.QC_MNG_SEQ , F.ATCH_FILE_SEQ , F.ATCH_FILE_SE , GAM_GET_FILE_SE_NM(F.ATCH_FILE_SE) ATCH_FILE_SE_NM , F.ATCH_FILE_SJ , F.ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC , F.ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL , TO_CHAR(F.ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT FROM QC_MNG_ATCH_FILE_F F WHERE F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo# AND F.FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe# AND F.QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#sQcMngSeq#) ORDER BY F.ATCH_FILE_SEQ ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM QC_MNG_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo# AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe# AND QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#sQcMngSeq#)
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(ATCH_FILE_SEQ),0) + 1) FROM QC_MNG_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#qcMngSeq#)
INSERT INTO QC_MNG_ATCH_FILE_F ( FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , FCLTS_JOB_SE , QC_MNG_SEQ , ATCH_FILE_SEQ , ATCH_FILE_SE , ATCH_FILE_SJ , ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC , ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL , ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT , REG_USR , REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #fcltsMngGroupNo# , #fcltsJobSe# , TO_NUMBER(#qcMngSeq#) , TO_NUMBER(#maxAtchFileSeq#) , #atchFileSe# , #atchFileSj# , #atchFileNmLogic# , #atchFileNmPhysicl# , TO_DATE(#atchFileWritingDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #regUsr# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE QC_MNG_ATCH_FILE_F SET ATCH_FILE_SE = #atchFileSe# , ATCH_FILE_SJ = #atchFileSj# , ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC = #atchFileNmLogic# , ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL = #atchFileNmPhysicl# , ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT = TO_DATE(#atchFileWritingDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , UPD_USR = #updUsr# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#qcMngSeq#) AND ATCH_FILE_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#atchFileSeq#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM QC_MNG_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#qcMngSeq#) AND ATCH_FILE_SEQ = #atchFileSeq#
DELETE FROM QC_MNG_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#qcMngSeq#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT R.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , R.FCLTS_JOB_SE , R.QC_MNG_SEQ , R.QC_ITEM_CD , I.QC_ITEM_NM , I.QC_ITEM_UPPER_CD , (SELECT QC_ITEM_NM FROM QC_ITEM_CD_F WHERE QC_ITEM_CD = I.QC_ITEM_UPPER_CD) AS QC_ITEM_UPPER_NM , R.SEQ , R.INSP_RESULT_CHK , GAM_GET_INSP_RESULT_CHK_NM(R.INSP_RESULT_CHK) INSP_RESULT_CHK_NM , R.INSP_RESULT_CN FROM QC_MNG_RESULT_ITEM_F R INNER JOIN QC_ITEM_CD_F I ON R.QC_ITEM_CD = I.QC_ITEM_CD WHERE R.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo# AND R.FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe# AND R.QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#sQcMngSeq#) ORDER BY I.QC_ITEM_UPPER_CD, R.SEQ ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM QC_MNG_RESULT_ITEM_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo# AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #sFcltsJobSe# AND QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#sQcMngSeq#)
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(SEQ),0) + 1) FROM QC_MNG_RESULT_ITEM_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#qcMngSeq#)
INSERT INTO QC_MNG_RESULT_ITEM_F ( FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , FCLTS_JOB_SE , QC_MNG_SEQ , QC_ITEM_CD , SEQ , INSP_RESULT_CHK , INSP_RESULT_CN , REG_USR , REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #fcltsMngGroupNo# , #fcltsJobSe# , TO_NUMBER(#qcMngSeq#) , #qcItemCd# , TO_NUMBER(#maxSeq#) , #inspResultChk# , #inspResultCn# , #regUsr# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE QC_MNG_RESULT_ITEM_F SET INSP_RESULT_CHK = #inspResultChk# , INSP_RESULT_CN = #inspResultCn# , UPD_USR = #updUsr# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#qcMngSeq#) AND QC_ITEM_CD = #qcItemCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM QC_MNG_RESULT_ITEM_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#qcMngSeq#) AND QC_ITEM_CD = #qcItemCd#
DELETE FROM QC_MNG_RESULT_ITEM_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# AND FCLTS_JOB_SE = #fcltsJobSe# AND QC_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#qcMngSeq#)
